title: Bookkeeper
job_overview:
1) Record day-to-day financial transactions and complete the posting process
2) Maintain accurate and up-to-date general ledger
3) Reconcile bank, credit card, and vendor statements
4) Prepare financial reports and assist with budget tracking
5) Maintain and organize financial records in accordance with company policies and compliance standards
6) Collaborate with CPA and Controller for tax filings and compliance
7) Perform other administrative and financial tasks as assigned

This job is starting as a part time 10-15 hours/week but has the potential to grow into more as we take on more clients.
